password_complexity.description: Set of mandatory characters allowed for password like uppercase, lowecase, numbers and symbols.

permitted_symbols.title: Password Symbols
permitted_symbols.description: Symbols which are allowed in the password, if left empty that means all the symbols are allowed.

force_password_reset.title: Force Change Password Flag
force_password_reset.description: Disconnect all users and Force user to Change Password upon next login.

enable_failed_attempts_lockout.title: Enable Failed attempts lockout
enable_failed_attempts_lockout.description: This flag enables Account lockout on Failed login Attempts.

failed_attempts_limit.title: Failed attempts limit
failed_attempts_limit.description: No of Failed login Attempts before Account is locked.

failed_attempts_lockout_duration.title: Failed Attempts Lockout time.
failed_attempts_lockout_duration.description: Duration of Account Lockdown(in min) if Failed login attempts exceeds the limit.

inactive_account_lockout_duration.title: Inactive Account lockout
inactive_account_lockout_duration.description: Inactive account Duration(in days), after which user will not be allowed to login into the account.

password_expiration_duration.title: Password Expiration
password_expiration_duration.description: Password Expiration Duration(in Days), after which user needs to change their password.

minimum_password_age.title: Minimum Password Age
minimum_password_age.description: Minimum amount of time(in Days) the user has to wait after a password change to change the password again.
